entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

entity.name: COVID-19 misinformation
entity.description: This is a list of Tweets highlighting corrections to misinformation surrounding COVID-19 from experts, fact-checkers and journalists.

text:
#NEWS  1,224 US coronavirus deaths have been reported as of 8pE Saturday night, the most US deaths reported in one day so far.

There are now a total of 8,376 deaths nationwide.

Based on data supplied by Johns Hopkins University.
